#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

#define gc getchar_unlocked

void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

int main ()
{
    int t, len, i;
    int count;
    char str[100001];
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",str);
        len = strlen (str);
        if(len%2==1)
		{
			printf("NO\n");
			continue;
		}
		if(str[0]=='D' || str[len-1]=='T')
		{
			printf("NO\n");
			continue;
		}
		count = 0;
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(str[i]=='T')
                count++;
            else
                count--;
            if(count<0)
                break;
        }
		if(count==0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
	}
    return 0;
}
